languages.text: "А блюстяки, псины пустотные, обосрались-то, что шишки с верхних палуб в гости пожалуют, да все их дерьмецо увидят".
"The 'forcers shat their pants like the void dogs they are when they heard upper deck bigwigs might come see all their mess for themselves."
languages.original_text: "А блюстяки, псины пустотные, обосрались-то, что шишки с верхних палуб в гости пожалуют, да все их дерьмецо увидят".

traits.locale_text: "The enfies shat their pants like the void dogs they are when they heard upper-deck bigwigs might come over and see all their shit for themselves."

languages.text: «Los guardias por poco no se cagaron encima como los perros del vacío que son cuando se enteraron de que los mandamases de las cubiertas superiores iban a venir a ver este desastre».
languages.original_text: "The 'forcers shat their pants like the void dogs they are when they heard upper deck bigwigs might come see all their mess for themselves."

traits.locale_text: «Los guardias por poco no se cagaron encima como los perros del vacío que son cuando se enteraron de que los mandamases de las cubiertas superiores iban a venir a ver este desastre».

languages.text: 「あのフォーサーども、上層デッキのお偉いさんたちが自分たちのゴタゴタ騒ぎを見に来るかもしれないって聞いて、虚空の犬みたいにお漏らししてたぜ」
languages.original_text: "The 'forcers shat their pants like the void dogs they are when they heard upper deck bigwigs might come see all their mess for themselves."

traits.locale_text: 「あのフォーサーども、常総デッキのお偉いさんたちが自分たちのゴタゴタ騒ぎを見に来るかもしれないって聞いて、虚空の犬みたいにお漏らししてたぜ」

languages.text: “那些执法者一听说上面的大人物可能会亲自视察，一个个吓得都尿裤子了。他们搞出来的烂摊子再也瞒不住了。”
languages.original_text: "The 'forcers shat their pants like the void dogs they are when they heard upper deck bigwigs might come see all their mess for themselves."

traits.locale_text: “那些执法者一听说上面的大人物可能会亲自视察，一个个吓得都尿裤子了。他们搞出来的烂摊子再也瞒不住了。”

languages.text: "Die Enforcers haben sich in die Hose geschissen wie die Leerenhunde, die sie sind, als sie hörten, dass hohe Tiere von den oberen Decks sich ihr Chaos mal persönlich ansehen wollen."
languages.original_text: "The 'forcers shat their pants like the void dogs they are when they heard upper deck bigwigs might come see all their mess for themselves."

traits.locale_text: "Die Enforcers haben sich in die Hose geschissen wie die Leerenhunde, die sie sind, als sie hörten, dass hohe Tiere von den oberen Decks sich ihr Chaos mal persönlich ansehen wollen."

languages.text: « Les prévôts ont chié leurs frocs quand ils ont entendu que les huiles du pont supérieur allaient peut-être venir en personne pour voir ce qui se passe. »
languages.original_text: "The 'forcers shat their pants like the void dogs they are when they heard upper deck bigwigs might come see all their mess for themselves."

traits.locale_text: « Les prévôts ont chié leurs frocs quand ils ont entendu que les huiles du pont supérieur allaient peut-être venir en personne pour voir ce qui se passe. »

languages.text: "İnfazcılar, neden oldukları tüm bu karmaşayı kendi gözleriyle görmek için üst güverte kodamanlarının gelebileceğini duyunca uçsuz itleri gibi pantolonlarına pisledi."
languages.original_text: "The 'forcers shat their pants like the void dogs they are when they heard upper deck bigwigs might come see all their mess for themselves."
